name: Classic Running Short
description: Lightweight and breathable running shorts designed for ultimate comfort during your workouts. Features an elastic waistband and quick-dry fabric.

name: Performance Gym Tee
description: An essential gym t-shirt built with moisture-wicking fabric to keep you cool and dry. Perfect for any athletic activity.

name: Cozy Fleece Hoodie
description: Super soft and warm fleece hoodie for kids. Ideal for chilly days or just lounging around.

name: Durable Canvas Tote
description: A versatile and sturdy canvas tote bag, perfect for everyday use, groceries, or a trip to the beach. Features reinforced handles.

name: Track & Field Joggers
description: Stylish and comfortable joggers designed for both training and casual wear. Tapered fit with zippered pockets.

name: Youth Training Sneakers
description: Lightweight and supportive sneakers for active kids. Provides excellent grip and comfort for all their adventures.

name: Sporty Compression Leggings
description: High-waisted compression leggings offering support and flexibility for all types of workouts. Features a hidden pocket.

name: Casual Denim Jacket
description: A classic denim jacket that never goes out of style. Perfect for layering and adding a touch of cool to any outfit.

name: Animated Graphic Tee
description: Fun and colorful graphic t-shirt featuring popular cartoon characters. Made from 100% soft cotton.

name: Yoga Flow Tank Top
description: A relaxed-fit tank top perfect for yoga, pilates, or casual wear. The open-back design allows for maximum breathability.

name: Utility Cargo Shorts
description: Durable and practical cargo shorts with multiple pockets for all your essentials. Made from a rugged cotton twill.

name: Rainy Day Raincoat
description: A bright and cheerful raincoat to keep your little one dry on rainy days. Features a soft lining for extra comfort.

name: Elegant Crossbody Bag
description: A chic and compact crossbody bag, perfect for keeping your essentials close while on the go. Features a magnetic closure and adjustable strap.

name: Classic Crewneck Sweater
description: A timeless crewneck sweater made from a soft merino wool blend. A versatile piece for any wardrobe.

name: Playtime Romper
description: An adorable and comfortable one-piece romper for easy dressing and all-day play. Snap closures for quick changes.

name: High-Impact Sports Bra
description: Supportive sports bra designed for high-impact activities. Features adjustable straps and a breathable mesh panel.

name: Rugged Hiking Boots
description: Waterproof and durable hiking boots designed for tackling tough trails. Provides excellent ankle support and traction.

name: Sun-Protective Swimsuit
description: Long-sleeve swimsuit with UPF 50+ sun protection. Quick-drying and stretchy for a comfortable fit.

name: Athleisure Zip-Up Jacket
description: A sleek and stylish zip-up jacket perfect for post-workout errands or a casual day out. Made from a four-way stretch fabric.

name: Polo Performance Shirt
description: A classic polo shirt updated with performance fabric that wicks moisture and resists wrinkles. Perfect for the golf course or a casual Friday.
